```{r}

x

end(x)
```


```{r}
set.seed(0)
lambda <- c(rep(0.001, 4500), seq(0.001, 10, length = 500),
 seq(10, 0.001, length = 500))
xVector <- Rle(rpois(1e7, lambda))
yVector <- Rle(rpois(1e7, lambda[c(251:length(lambda), 1:250)]))

```
